text: Igor Nikitin (born February 29, 1952) is a Soviet weightlifter. He won the Silver medal in 100 kg category in the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow. . ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic weightlifters of the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Weightlifters at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Soviet male weightlifters
title: Igor Nikitin (weightlifter)
